titleInfo.title: Alien Allies. The Relations between History, Sociology, and Economics in Germany, 19th-20th Centuries

name.namePart: Bielefeld Graduate School in History and Sociology

titleInfo.title: The Strengh of History at the Doors of the New Millenium. History and the other Social and Human Sciences along XXth Century (1899-2002)
